message.body: Happy New Year's Eve! Is there any way you could call in a sinus infection antibiotic to a 24 hr pharmacy for Richie? Is there a 24 hr one near us?
Hi there--I haven't responded because I've been working through my own feverish haze. I have the plague :-( Did ####### get anything figured out?
Augh, we all do! Yeah, he was able to get a script. Feel better!
